text.tspan: For the following days after, Celine still lay awake at night thinking about Jake's appearance at the parade.
One day, amid these unexplained feelings, soldiers burst into her home, seized her, and dragged her to the
Fidelion Tower. Summoned before the Emperor, without speaking a word, Jake raised her rank to a citizen
without further explanation and ordered her to work in the Fidelion Tower. While this is not unheard of, it
was an unprecedented rise in rank within the Empire, and her treatment at the tower was understandably less
than favorable. She struggled to rise to the occasion, working hard, wondering why she was suddenly
promoted to her rank, and occasionally longing for her old life.
Despite her jealousy and envy, Celine does her best to fulfill her duties at the palace, which is to say, the menial
tasks. One day, she is assigned to clean Jake's office, and when she runs into him again, he somehow assigns her the
sole responsibility of cleaning his office the next day. Despite the envy and jealousy of the other workers, Celine
stuck to her task and fulfilled her duties. Although the work was hard and lonely, it wasn't a bad experience to
casually bump into and talk to Jake. Jake didn't treat her as a maid, and her curiosity about him grew. As their
conversations became more casual and she grew closer to him, she gradually developed feelings for him.
Meanwhile, her position at the company was rising by the day. Jake recognized her talent early on and reassigned
her to the military ranks. There, she picked up the military training so quickly that, at some point, she was no
longer a janitor but a soldier. Before long, she had become an integral part of Fidelia's military. As Jake watched,
he realized Celine had grown to hold a large place in his heart. Eventually, against the wishes of many, Jake
crowned her Empress, and she rose to the highest position in the Empire.
